name: cilkpride
description: Experimental package that passively runs cilksan in the background for Cilk projects.

tapirSettings.title: Shell Settings
tapirSettings.description: If you are running Cilksan and Cilkprof locally, we will need information on where the compilers and libs are.

gccLocation.title: GCC 4.8 Cilkplus Directory
gccLocation.description: To run Tapir, we'll need the GCC 4.8 Cilkplus-enabled compiler. The location of where the compiler lives goes here. Separate directories with a colon.

extraPathDirectories.title: Extra Path Directories
extraPathDirectories.description: Place any additional directories needed for the $PATH variable. This includes Tapir, Cilksan, and Cilkprof locations. Separate directories with a colon.

extraLibraryPathDirectories.title: Extra Library Path Directories
extraLibraryPathDirectories.description: Place any additional directories needed for the $LIBRARY_PATH variable. This includes Tapir, Cilksan, and Cilkprof locations. Separate directories with a colon.

extraLDLibraryPathDirectories.title: Extra LD Library Path Directories
extraLDLibraryPathDirectories.description: Place any additional directories needed for the $LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable. This includes Tapir, Cilksan, and Cilkprof locations. Separate directories with a colon.

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.description: Cilkpride-general settings can be found here.

idleSeconds.title: Idle Length
idleSeconds.description: Changes the number of seconds the text editor must be idle before running cilkscreen.

watchDirectory.title: Watch Project Directory
watchDirectory.description: Enable this to automatically upload when any file in the directory is changed, not only when you save from Atom. Also automatically syncs at the beginning, after SSHing.
